application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - With respect to Condition 5 (Cycle and Refuse Storage), In the absence of drawings detailing the exact siting, specification and storage capacity of cycle and bin storage associated with the proposed development, the Council cannot be satisfied that sufficient bin and cycle storage would be provided. The proposed development would thereby be contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy T5 of the London Plan (2021), and Policies DM42 and DM45 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Reason : 2 - In failing to provide a Fire Safety Statement, which is the fundamental requirement for Condition 6 (Fire Safety), the Council cannot be satisfied that fire risks for the proposed development would be satisfactorily managed, contrary to Policy D12A of the London Plan (2021).
description: Details pursuant to conditions 3 (materials), 4 (windows and doors), 5 (cycle and refuse storage) and 6 (fire safety) attached to planning permission P/1623/22 dated 12/07/2022 for Conversion of part rear at ground floor and basement levels from school storage area (use class F1a) into self contained headmaster's flat ancillary to the existing boarding house; single storey extension facing north and west, new dormer window on north elevation, new fenestration
